title: Got Perma Banned Wrongfully
body:
Basically got Perma Banned because of these two games, its absolutely hillarious.
Game 2
Pre-Game
Deitus: filld
In-Game
Deitus: cant believe i get filled last game of the season
Deitus: what you mean?
Deitus: fun
Deitus: did he heal?
Deitus: bruv do you not see
Deitus: im autofilled
Deitus: so can you
Deitus: lol
Deitus: im questioning
Deitus: your sanity
Deitus: why would you blame me
Deitus: because you died
Deitus: while typing
Deitus: lol
Deitus: lol
Deitus: ur funny
Deitus: yeah report me for being autofilled
Deitus: and him dying because of typing
Deitus: :D
Deitus: just mute him hes prob gonna bitch all game
Deitus: my braum
Deitus: does not want
Deitus: to put up his shield
Deitus: you have w right?
Deitus: and e?
Deitus: unfortunate
Deitus: gg
Deitus: yes pls
Deitus: i mean im trying my best
Deitus: but again
Deitus: i dont play this role
Deitus: at all
Deitus: 800 dmg
Deitus: i dont play
Deitus: this role
Deitus: at all
Deitus: whats ur point
Deitus: oh yeah
Deitus: because i wont feed
Deitus: if you flame me
Deitus: good logic
Deitus: ur smart buddy
Deitus: keep talking
Deitus: reported for toxic and negative
Deitus: gg
Post-Game
Deitus: lol
Deitus: You do know
Deitus: im an irelia onetrick
Deitus: buddy
Deitus: Did you know
Deitus: you dont have to be an asshole
Deitus: :)
Deitus: Yeah im done talking to you
Deitus: reported
Game 3
In-Game
Deitus: io sono un richo
Deitus: 20$ that sion is a 350 pound male that lives in his parents basement     <--- ( its a joke)
Deitus: you could
Deitus: have flashed
Deitus: for that sion
Deitus: i see
Deitus: quite unfortunate
Deitus: i won the 2 v 1 tho
Deitus: this sion
Deitus: is mad
Deitus: af
Deitus: you filled?
Deitus: chill bud
Deitus: sorry team
Deitus: you actually killed me while afk?
Deitus: fucking pussies
Deitus: LOL WAHT?
Deitus: you didnt dc
Deitus: I didnt play the game
Deitus: today
Deitus: lmao
Deitus: can i farm a lane
Deitus: sorry
Deitus: but theres no point
Deitus: exactly
Deitus: yeah report me gg wp
Deitus: bruv
Deitus: no point
Deitus: of wasting time
Deitus: has no diffference
Deitus: lmao yeah
Deitus: reported for abuse
Deitus: lets see who gets banned first
Deitus: one dc game
Deitus: or your ass with abusive behavior
Deitus: nah you wanted to talk
Deitus: lets talk motherfucker
Deitus: i cant clear
Deitus: this
Deitus: dont get
Deitus: how they
Deitus: lost fights
Deitus: legit
Deitus: gg
Deitus: report nocturne
Deitus: abusive
Deitus: bg
Post-Game
Deitus: lol what sion?
Deitus: You lost top so hard
Deitus: i actually tore you a new asshole
Deitus: but hey nocturne said kys just report him hell get a insta ban  <----- ( how does this deserve a report )
Deitus: lol
Deitus: the only reason
Deitus: you did more
Deitus: is because i dcd
Deitus: Thats the only tway
Deitus: you do more
____________________________________________________________________________________
So basically to make things clear, correct me if im wrong you get banned because of sufficient reports right? WIth that in consideration All 3 of the games contributed to my PERMANENT ban first one I cannot say it wasnt deserved. But in these 2 I sure as hell did not deserve it. _**Which means i wouldnt have gotten a permanent ban if i didnt get reported in the last 2 games**_.Clarification of the thing i said to Sion ( He was the enemy toplaner with a girly name like Kawaii Girl , to which i said  "_20$ that sion is a 350 pound male that lives in his parents basement_" which wasnt in a hurtfull maner. FOR COMEDIC PURPOSES ONLY, and ty everyone who took their time to reply and discuss this topic even if it isnt so interesting

replies.body: You have game 2 and 3, where is game 1?
I admit game 1 was kind of negative basically was spamming to ff because i obviously knew i deserved a report for that

"Deitus: 20$ that sion is a 350 pound male that lives in his parents basement"

"Deitus: fucking pussies"

"Deitus: report nocturne"

"Deitus: but hey nocturne said kys just report him hell get a insta ban"

All of the above quotes are reportable offenses in the eye of Riot. Since this is a Perma-ban you are a repeat offender and this is more than justified.

Wait so the first thing is a joke concering the name of the enemy team toplaner, the 2nd one is competitive banter, and since when is saying report nocturne reportable, or just stating the obvious fact in which you get instantly punished by the system when typing the letters "kys"

> [{quoted}](name=Deitus,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=T79lW6R3,comment-id=00010002,timestamp=2018-11-18T23:21:53.927+0000)
>
> Wait so the first thing is a joke concering the name of the enemy team toplaner, the 2nd one is competitive banter, and since when is saying report nocturne reportable, or just stating the obvious fact in which you get instantly punished by the system when typing the letters "kys"

Calling for reports has been a punishable offense for a long time, and additional reports beyond the first don't make any difference anyway.

You earned that perma.
Prime example of what constitutes a ban.

> Basically got Perma Banned because of these two games, its absolutely hillarious.

Is that why you hide Game 1?
No, i didnt actually hide game 1, just decided not to post it because i knew i deserved a report for that one due to negative behaviour concerning wanting to forfit.

"I got banned wrongfully"

>"Deitus: 20$ that sion is a 350 pound male that lives in his parents basement"
"Deitus: fucking pussies"
"Deitus: but hey nocturne said kys just report him hell get a insta ban"

 You're a repeat offender by the looks of it, considering that your chat history is nonstop arguing and flaming. The ban was well deserved and I **seriously** doubt Riot would even consider overturning it.

Wait how is a joke and competitive banter reportable, and then when i said a fact that you instantly get suspended for typing "kys" is considered toxic? I do not get the logic behind that. Take into account twitch streamers say hella worse stuff in chat and are still playing the game. :) ty for the reply tho

Because you weren't joking and this wasn't competitive banter.

Joking is saying something funny that isn't insulting, and competitive banter is something like "We're going to crush you guys!" Inoffensive, light hearted, promotes more intense gameplay. Calling someone a 350 pound male living in their parent's basement is neither of these. 

 I seriously doubt you went from a 10-game chat restriction to a permaban off this game, even with you saying 'kys'. You deserved a punishment because you were insanely toxic all throughout the game and most players wouldn't want you on their team. You most likely had a 7-day or 14-day ban beforehand, and this punishment escalated that to permanent.

 If that wasn't the case, you simply didn't have to repeat 'kys' in chat. You should also have been aware of the fact that 9 reports weigh the same as 1 report. You reporting Nocturne for hate speech is enough, you don't need to get the entire game against him for a punishment to occur. One and done, that's all it takes.

 If Twitch streamers have said worse with evidence then that's messed up. I haven't seen any streamer or content creators do this, so I can't speak on the matter. Even so, that's not justification for you to be toxic in game, because other people are doing it.

High chance that he got picked up b y ifs for 

Deitus: but hey nocturne said kys just report him hell get a insta ban

And he wouldn't receive a punishment if he didn't parrot the word. Not impressed by this sort of justice.
if you got permed you were already on thin ice, that aint why he got banned all of it is why he got banned

> [{quoted}](name=Dr Dog,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=T79lW6R3,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2018-11-13T18:15:26.392+0000)
>
> if you got permed you were already on thin ice, that aint why he got banned all of it is why he got banned

We might discuss it if he posts game 1. Otherwise it is pointless.
ya true, i doubt he'll post game one anyway obviously if he left it out its because he was spouting a lot of 0 tolerance stuff in it

I can post it but makes no difference cause just decided not to post it because i knew i deserved a report for that one due to negative behaviour concerning wanting to forfit and flaming the inter in my game, legit had an inting teammate ( not just having a bad day, legit straight up running it down mid )
If you received a 14 day ban then yes this is justified. Calling your teammate a "350 pound male that lives in his parents basement" is not usually a compliment.
It was a joke to the enemy toplaner who had a Kawaii Female name or something like that cant remember exactly, but was along those lines.
Game 1?
Gotta say, this is hilarious. Definitely worthy of a ban but you did it with style mate, gj!
